CellLayout seems to have a bug in that it can't layout empty composites containing no controls and no columns.

Re: comment 4

Num columns = 0 has a special meaning: it means that the number of columns should equal the number of widgets (or, equivalently, that everything belongs in one row).

This is why it caused a problem when there were no widgets - when there are no widgets, columns=0 really does mean "no columns".
